class.name: CircleProblem

javadoc.text:
Class that models a circle. * The parameters of problem are: *
    *
  • the x-coordinate of the circle center,
    • *
  • the y-coordinate of the circle center,
    • *
  • the radius of the circle.
    • *
* The model functions are: *
    *
  • for each triplet (cx, cy, r), the (x, y) coordinates of a point on the * corresponding circle.
    • *
Cloud of points assumed to be fitted by a circle.
Error on the x-coordinate of the points.
Error on the y-coordinate of the points.

javadoc.param: xError Assumed error for the x-coordinate of the circle points.
yError Assumed error for the y-coordinate of the circle points.
